description: This rich and fragrant curry features chickpeas, sweet potato and baby spinach, and is cooked in a coconut milk and korma paste sauce.
name: Chickpea & Sweet Potato Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir three-quarters of the spinach into curry mixture. Cover and simmer for a further 5 minutes or until spinach has wilted and potato is tender. Top curry with remaining spinach, then serve with rice.
